roleset.name: shock, cause a scandal
roleset.note: SCANDALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'scandalize' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1. (from scandalize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: His guest appearance on the NBC soap opera ``Another World,'' scandalized musical elitists.
example.arg: His guest appearance on the NBC soap opera ``Another World

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary scandalized everyone by wearing a low-cut, bright red dress to John's funeral.
example.arg: by wearing a low-cut, bright red dress to John's funeral
